markdown.markdown:
Leadership isn't a title, but a foundation of trust, a drive for action, and problem-solving with purpose. Whether I am working to transform systems or supporting a colleague, I seek to lead by working together, by talking, and by making things clear. Leadership involves influencing, not directing. --- # üíº Leadership in Action ‚Äì ERP Coordination At Hellmann Worldwide Logistics, where I did my internship, I was involved in a full country rollout of Microsoft Dynamics 365. Although I did not have an official leadership position, I: Worked together with all cities' finance teams - Improved processes for performing user testing and training team members Provided support in intercompany coordination among regional subsidiaries Through this action, I practiced leadership without formal authority and established trust in team communication and problem-solving. --- # üë•Peer Support and Mentorship - At Outlook India, I assisted in training the other interns on learning reporting processes and Excel automation. - I provide informal mentoring to undergraduate business students through LinkedIn resume critiques, career counsel, and interview coaching. These experiences taught me about being gentle and how to be a leader in quiet but strong ways. --- # ‚ù§Ô∏è Community Engagement
Member ‚Äì Lions Club International
- Organized intercollege quizzes and debate competitions
- Supported underprivileged children with school fees
- Helped facilitate donation drives for the needy
Volunteer ‚Äì Environmentalist Foundation of India (EFI)
- Led community groups for weekly beach and city cleanups
- Promoted sustainability and civic responsibility through action
--- # üîë Leadership Lessons I Live By - Trust leads to empathy - Structure makes action possible - Collaboration results in better outcomes - All of the openings are leadership roles --- # üöÄ Looking Ahead Growing into an emerging financial leader, my intention is to lead through purpose ‚Äî blending strategic thinking and people-focused thinking to drive positive change within whatever organization I am part of.
